TopicTitle: Add a part variant with no "shroud" (the thing that extends into craft) to docking port

Articles.Content:
Dockidg ports sometimes can look ugly when their "shroud" isn't sunk into craft they're mounted on.

I think a variant with that thing removed (or shortened considerably) would be nice little addition to thr game.
Editing that model that probably won't require that much effort too.

Here's a few pictures I've edited to show how it may look like:
I understand your logic but I find they all sit flush already when used with the right size? If there are any that aren’t for whatever reason you could just offset them in the editor.

@FruitGoose

Most basic example: mount a docking port on a wing. A part of it's model will be poking through the other side. Makes some things, like mounting points, or articulated ports, look weird.  That's what I'm talking about.

I think it does have a purpose, it's so that it doesn't look weird when you attach it radially to a cylindrical part. That's why I'm suggesting to add variant instead of outright removing it.
